value.name: California’s attorney general is fighting to keep the names of CHP officers who killed Erik Salgado secret
value.description: But the officers’ identities could be made public as early as next month after a federal judge ruled the public has a right to know.

value.name: Here's what's changed in Bay Area policing since murder of George Floyd
value.description: As we reflect back on the murder of George Floyd a year ago, we've seen protests, calls to defund the police, promises for reform, and cries for change. But, what's really changed in Bay Area policing?
